name: Twin Gunners
blurb: 16 bit, retro, run 'n' gun heaven. Multitude of bosses, huge amount of weapons and two player co-op. Nothing like a slice of retro!

rewards.reward: Get your name in the "Special Thanks" part of the credits as well as an exclusive hi-res wallpaper, e-mailed to you for your computer!
Receive a downloadable copy of the game as well as your name in the "Super Special Thanks" part of the credits! Also I'll throw in that hi-res wallpaper too.

As well as the downloadable game, that hi-res wallpaper you'll also grab a downloadable OST for yourself. Wow your friends with all that lovely retro music! (Also you'll have your name in the "Super Duper Special Thanks" part of the credits.)

You fancy having a custom message on the title screen for yourself? Tell something to a loved one, a child or cat? Well with this option you can add that message to your downloadable game! (You'll also receive a downloadable OST, hi-res wallpaper and your name will appear in the "Super Duper Special Thanks" part of the credits.)\r\n\r\n*Note: No profanity, racist, hurtful messages will be allowed.

By pledging \u00a310, you'll get an only one in the world, concept artwork sent to you through the mail! You'll also grab yourself a downloadable version of the game, OST and hi-res wallpaper! (AND, your name will be in the "Super Duper Special Thanks" part of the credits!)

Get a physical copy of the game, as well as the OST and hi-res wallpaper! (And why not a little concept doodle as well!) Also have your name in the "Super Duper Mega Awesome Special Thanks" part of the credits!

Design an in-game enemy! Yes that's right, design one of those little critters that the good guys will blow up! You'll also receive a downloadable version of the game as well as the OST and hi-res wallpaper! Your name will also be in the credits under, "Enemy Designer!"\r\n\r\n*No profanity, nudity, racist, hurtful ideas will be allowed.

Design an in-game boss character! Yes that's right, design one of those huge mammoths that the good guys will blow up! You'll also receive a downloadable version of the game as well as the OST and hi-res wallpaper! Your name will also be in the credits under, "Boss Dude Creator!"\r\n\r\n*No profanity, nudity, racist, hurtful ideas will be allowed.

Buy in game advertisement! You want ad-space with-in this game? Well if you pledge just \u00a350 you'll get a nice big box to advertise! You'll also grab yourself a downloadable copy of the game, OST and hi-res wallpaper. You'll also have your name in the "Super Duper Mega Awesome Special Thanks" part of the credits!

Design a level! Yes that's right, design a entire level the good guys will need to complete! With this you can design one enemy and boss for the stage as well! You'll also receive a downloadable version of the game as well as the OST and hi-res wallpaper! Your name will also be in the credits under, "Level Creator"\r\n\r\n*No profanity, nudity, racist, hurtful ideas will be allowed.

Design a level, two bosses and three enemies for the game! Also you'll receive a physical copy of the game. (As well as a downloadable OST and hi-res wallpaper.) You'll also gain an ad-space slot too! Your name will also be in the credits, under "Super Amazing Awesome People" as well as "Boss, Enemy and Level creator". \r\n\r\n*No profanity, nudity, racist, hurtful ideas will be allowed.
